transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Sir aapne call disconnect kar di thi.
Customer: Haan ji woh by mistake ho gayi.
Executive: Ji?
Customer: Ji theek hai ye main join karta hu zoom zoom.
Executive: Ek second sir line pe rahe please.
Customer: Okay.

Executive: Sir apna WhatsApp number bata de please.
Customer: Eight ye WhatsApp number
Executive: Eight
Customer: Ek minute aap line pe WhatsApp number chahiye.
Executive: 99
Customer: 99
Executive: 39 39 haan ji.
Customer: 81
Executive: 81
Customer: 3141
Executive: 31
Customer: 3141
Executive: Sir 9939813141.
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Sir ye WhatsApp pe number hai?
Customer: Haan ji haan ji.

Executive: Ek bari hello reply kare sir mujhe.
Customer: Theek hai ye number aapka hai na WhatsApp pe by the way.
Executive: Ji haan ye mera hi number hai sir.
Customer: Theek hai hello sir reply kar dena.
Executive: Theek hai.

Executive: Ek second sir.
Executive: Line pe dijiyega.
Customer: Hello sir reply karna.
Customer: Aap karo na.
Customer: Haan ji haan ji aa gaya.
Executive: Ek second sir.

Customer: Kya aawaj nahi aa rahi hai aapki phone mein phone mein.
Customer: [unintelligible]
Customer: Mere to aage piche hai lekin
Customer: Apne aapke paas aapke account manager ka number nahi hai sir?
Customer: Ji bataiye.
Executive: Account manager ka number hai aapke paas?
Customer: Account manager ka number?
Executive: Haan ji jo aapka account handle karta hai sir IndiaMART se.
Customer: Achcha account manager ka number hai? Haan hai.
Executive: Unhone respond nahi kiya sir aapko?
Customer: Na na main batata hu main ab maine call le li hai to main hi connect karta hu sir.
Customer: Theek hai.

Executive: Video meeting ka ek link bheja hai sir.
Customer: Ek second isme kya kya check kar lete hai. Ek bari check kariye please.

Customer: Ye hai?

Customer: Woh lagao na. Aap log wholesaling karte hai sir aap wholesaling karte hai manufacturing unit hai aapki?
Customer: Ye dono karte hai wholesaling bhi karte hai aur manufacturing bhi hai.
Executive: Achcha achcha achcha. Haan ji.

Executive: Aur aapko Gujarat se kis suppliers ko dekhna hai Gujarat mein kaun kaun suppliers hai ye cheez na unka number chahiye aapko.
Customer: Haan ji haan ji.
Executive: Waha ke jo suppliers hai manufacturers hai unka contact details chahiye.
Executive: Ek bari aapne check kara WhatsApp pe jo maine bheja hai aapko?
Customer: WhatsApp pe ek second main check karta hu.
Customer: WhatsApp.
Executive: Teen number is pe hai sir jisne aapne hello kara tha.
Customer: Achcha theek hai.
Customer: Haan maine join kar liya. Join kar liya meeting mein discussion kar rahe hai sir main call disconnect kar raha hu theek hai.
Customer: Theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer disconnected the call by mistake.

- Needs Gujarat suppliers and manufacturers contact details.



Resolution:

- Executive shared WhatsApp number with customer.

- Executive sent a video meeting link on WhatsApp.

- Executive confirmed customer has account manager number.



Next Steps: 

- Customer joined the meeting; executive disconnected call.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- whatsapp, video meeting, suppliers, account manager
